inventory=[{"type": "fire_coral", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "black_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "creeper_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "light_gray_terracotta", "quantity": 10, "index": 14}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass", "quantity": 6, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 36, "index": 26}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 6, "index": 31}, {"type": "honeycomb_block", "quantity": 56, "index": 44}]
thought: I need to craft a pink_stained_glass_pane. To do this I need to place 6 pink_stained_glass blocks in a horizontal line in the crafting grid. I will move 1 from slot 17 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
